item.title: State-space and autoregressive models
item.description: A linear state-space model can be converted to a linear autoregressive model and vice-versa. In this note we derive these equivalences: From state-space to AR From AR to state-space State-space model A linear discrete-time state-space model is given by \begin{align} x(t+1) &= Ax(t) + Bu(t) \\ y(t) &= Cx(t) + Du(t) \end{align} where $u\in\mathbb{R}^m$ is the input $x\in\mathbb{R}^n$ is the state $y\in\mathbb{R}^p$ is the output The matrices $A, B, C$ and $D$ are of appropriate dimension.
